data.title: Behind Our Smiles
data.meta_description: Join Joe and Tara Buchanan as they talk through marriage, parenting, and what it means to love your spouse "for better or for worse." Marriage can be messy, and parenting is often challenging. But after 25 years, Joe and Tara continue to love each other through the challenges and struggles. Listen along to hear their advice on how to faithfully love your partner and point them to Christ even in the midst of the messiness.
data.text:
Host Meridith Foster invites you to listen to The Unfolding podcast where she hears incredible stories about God’s love, mercy, faithfulness in the lives of others.

Keith Stevens shared the first time he met We The Kingdom as they played their songs acapella in the back of a small restaurant.

Meet Pam Lundell, host of A Widow’s Heart podcast, as she shares her story through widowhood to starting A Widow’s Heart.

Nicole Phillips, host of The Kindness Podcast, experienced God’s kindness firsthand when she appeared on the show The Price is Right.

“When God works in our lives, He is writing incredible stories,” Meridith Foster, host of The Unfolding, said.

“It’s just a blip in my story,” Gary Miracle shared on episode 81 of The Unfolding as he told Meridith Foster about the events of his life that led him to lose both his hands and feet.

Meridith Foster has a rich personal history with stories, and that background gave her the desire to transform that personal passion for stories into a professional career as host of The Unfolding podcast.

All too often those who are mentally ill are brushed off and told to toughen up.

Mental Health with Dr. Mork is designed to take away the stigma that mental illness can be given—particularly within the church.

Keith Steven’s shares the story of his conversation with Ryan Stevenson and the common loss that they shared in the loss of Ryan’s mother and Keith’s wife, Sue.

Once voted one of the top happiness podcasts by Oprah Winfrey, The Kindness Podcast is so much more than tips and cute stories.

Pam Lundell has been a friend to many across the radio waves, but widowhood sometimes bridges the gap.

Pam Lundell shares the story of Lori Larson Heller in episode 6 of A Widow’s Heart.

Married couple Joe and Tara Buchanan from the Behind Our Smiles podcast share a strategy they’ve learned that helps them appreciate each other’s ideas, even if the other person doesn’t necessarily agree.

Communication is the lifeblood of any relationship, and it’s especially important in marriage.

Joe and Tara Buchanan share the journeys they’ve traveled individually and as a couple that led them to create Behind Our Smiles, an honest, heartfelt podcast about the challenges and delights of marriage.
